name: Image Recovery (Easy Photo Restore)
description: Have you ever come across a situation where you just deleted all of your images by mistake? Image Recovery can undelete and recover lost photos and images from your memory card or internal memory. No rooting is required! Whether you accidentally deleted a photo, or even formatted your memory card, Image Recovery is a Powerful Recovery tool that Search your internal storage and SD card for deleted images and recover them again easily.  FEATURES:   Scan both internal and external memory (SD Card).  HD Graphics and User Friendly.  Easy, Fast, Safe and Quick Recovery Process.  Restore deleted pictures without rooting your mobile phone.  Support all Types of Images: jpg, jpeg, png.
